#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int a[1000000];
int main()
{
	int p=0,i,j,x,n,k,count=0,found;
	for(i=0;i<1000000;i++)
	a[i]=0;
	scanf("%d%d",&n,&k);
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		found=0;
		scanf("%d",&x);
		if(x%2==1&&x<k)
		{
			for(j=0;j<=p;j++)
			if(x==a[j])
			{
				found=1;
				break;
			}
			if(found==0)
			{
				a[p++]=x;
				count++;
			}
		}
	}
	printf("%d",count);
}
